text.section: The record shall be open to examination by the commissioner at all times within five (5) years after issuance of the coverage to which it relates.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1097, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 44, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 10, sec. 16, effective June 18, 1970.
